pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 5, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, October 5, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario  

11:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks at the Rolling Rampage reception.

Room 256-S
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Note: A young woman named Breanne will accompany the Prime Minister throughout the day as part of Plan International Canadaâ€™s Girls Belong Here campaign.
